text: Illa Al-Ladhina Yasiluna 'Ila Qawmin Baynakum Wa Baynahum Mithaqun 'Aw Ja'ukum Hasirat Suduruhum 'An Yuqatilukum 'Aw Yuqatilu Qawmahum Wa Law Sha'a Allahu Lasallatahum `Alaykum Falaqatalukum Fa'ini A`tazalukum Falam Yuqatilukum Wa 'Alqaw 'Ilaykumu As-Salama Fama Ja`ala Allahu Lakum `Alayhim Sabilaan
